alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 04 at 2:21PM AKDT until August 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 10 PM AKDT SUNDAY FOR EASTERN ALASKA RANGE... * AFFECTED AREA...Eastern Alaska Range. * TIMING...From noon Saturday to 10 PM AKDT Sunday. * WINDS...Southeast 15 to 25 mph. Gusts 30 to 40 mph in passes. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs near 80. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
